# Dr. Antonio Rojas Castro

Digital Humanities Research Associate at the Freie Universität Berlin and the University of Tübingen.  
I specialize in **digital scholarly editions**, **website development**, and **computational literary studies**.  
My current project analyzes **network structures** and the role of character typologies such as the _gracioso_ in **Golden Age Spanish theater**, using corpus-based and computational methods.
